variable.name: WTCUR_7
variable.comment: What is your current weight?

variable.name: WTMAX_7
variable.comment: In the past year, what was your highest weight?

variable.name: WTMIN_7
variable.comment: In the past year, what was your lowest weight?

variable.name: WALKSWK_7
variable.comment: Think about the walking you do outside the home. How often do you walk outside the home for more than 10 minutes without stopping? (Mark only one.)

variable.name: MINSWALK_7
variable.comment: When you walk outside the home for more than 10 minutes without stopping, for how many minutes do you usually walk? Sub-question of F147 V1 Q4 'Walk more than 10 min'.

variable.name: WALKSPD_7
variable.comment: What is your usual speed? Sub-question of F147 V1 Q4 'Walk more than 10 min'.

variable.name: HDEXFREQ_7
variable.comment: Not including walking outside the home, how often each week (7 days) do you usually do STRENUOUS OR VERY HARD EXERCISE (you work up a sweat and your heart beats fast)? For example, aerobics, aerobic dancing, jogging, tennis, swimming laps.

variable.name: HARDMINS_7
variable.comment: How long do usually exercise like this at one time? Sub-question of F147 V1 Q5 'Strenuous exercise'.

variable.name: MDEXFREQ_7
variable.comment: Not including walking outside the home, how often each week (7 days) do you usually do MODERATE EXERCISE (Not exhausting). For example, biking outdoors, use of an exercise machine (like a stationary bike or treadmill), calisthenics, easy swimming, popular and folk dancing.

variable.name: MODMINS_7
variable.comment: How long do usually exercise like this at one time? Sub-question of F147 V1 Q6 'Moderate exercise'.

variable.name: MLEXFREQ_7
variable.comment: Not including walking outside the home, how often each week (7 days) do you usually do MILD EXERCISE. For example, slow dancing, bowling, golf.

variable.name: MILDMINS_7
variable.comment: How long do usually exercise like this at one time? Sub-question of F147 V1 Q7 'Mild exercise'.

variable.name: SMOKENW_7
variable.comment: Do you smoke cigarettes now?

variable.name: CIGSDAY_7
variable.comment: How many cigarettes do you usually smoke each day? (Mark one.) Sub-question of F147 V1 Q8 'Smoke cigarettes now'.

variable.name: WTLMERID_7
variable.comment: Meridia (Sibutramine)

variable.name: WTLXENCL_7
variable.comment: Xenical (Orlistat)

variable.name: WTLPHENT_7
variable.comment: Phentermine (Fastin)

variable.name: WTLOTHER_7
variable.comment: Other prescription weight loss medication

variable.name: NATHOR_7
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use any 'natural' hormones that you can get without a doctor's prescription? These are usually made from plants and often obtained from health food stores or by mail order. They may be in the form of a pill, vaginal cream or suppository, skin cream or soy-enriched foods.

variable.name: YAMCRM_7
variable.comment: Wild yam cream Sub-question of F147 V1 Q10 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: YAMPLS_7
variable.comment: Wild yam pills Sub-question of F147 V1 Q10 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: PRGCRM_7
variable.comment: Progesterone cream Sub-question of F147 V1 Q10 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: PRGSUP_7
variable.comment: Progesterone suppositories Sub-question of F147 V1 Q10 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: DHEAPL_7
variable.comment: DHEA (dehydroepiandosterone pills) Sub-question of F147 V1 Q10 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: PHYPLS_7
variable.comment: Phytoestrogen pills or powder (soy or flax) Sub-question of F147 V1 Q10 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: PHYCRM_7
variable.comment: Phytoestrogen creams (soy or flax) Sub-question of F147 V1 Q10 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: PHYFDS_7
variable.comment: Phytoestrogen enriched foods (tofu, soybeans) Sub-question of F147 V1 Q10 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: NTOTHR_7
variable.comment: Other (Specify) Sub-question of F147 V1 Q10 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: NTDNTK_7
variable.comment: Don't know Sub-question of F147 V1 Q10 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: SRM_7
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use any non-estrogen prescription treatments for hormone replacement? These may be prescribed to prevent osteoporosis and breast cancer and are sometimes called 'designer estrogens' or selective estrogen receptor modulators (SERMs). Examples are Evista (Raloxifene) and Nolvadex (Tamoxifen).

variable.name: SRMEVST_7
variable.comment: Evista (Raloxifene) Sub-question of F147 V1 Q11 'Use non-estrogen prescription?'.

variable.name: SRMNOLU_7
variable.comment: Nolvadex (Tamoxifen) Sub-question of F147 V1 Q11 'Use non-estrogen prescription?'.

variable.name: SRMOTHR_7
variable.comment: Other (Specify) Sub-question of F147 V1 Q11 'Use non-estrogen prescription?'.

variable.name: SRMDNTK_7
variable.comment: Don't know Sub-question of F147 V1 Q11 'Use non-estrogen prescription?'.

variable.name: HRPST1YR_7
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use any female hormones (ESTROGEN or PROGESTERONE [also called PROGESTIN] that were prescribed by a doctor? (This may have been in the form of a pill, skin patch, shots, or vaginal cream or suppository.)

variable.name: EPPLPA_7
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use female hormone PILLS or PATCHES prescribed by a doctor which contained both ESTROGEN and progestin (PROGESTERONE) COMBINED in the same pill, patch, or package (for example, Prempro, Premphase)? (Do not include use of two separate estrogen and progestin pills used at the same time.) Sub-question of F147 V1 Q12 'Used female hormones/past year'.

variable.name: EPDUR_7
variable.comment:
In the past year, how many months did you use COMBINED female hormone PILLS or PATCH which contained both ESTROGEN and PROGESTIN? Sub-question of F147 V1 Q12 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F147 V1 Q13 'Comb estr/progest pills/patch'.

variable.name: EPTYPE_7
variable.comment:
Which combination did you use the longest? Sub-question of F147 V1 Q12 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F147 V1 Q13 'Comb estr/progest pills/patch'.

variable.name: ETPL_7
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use female hormone PILLS prescribed by a doctor which contained both ESTROGEN and TESTOSTERONE COMBINED in the same pill (for example, Estratest)? Sub-question of F147 V1 Q12 'Used female hormones/past year'.

variable.name: ETDUR_7
variable.comment:
In the past year, how many months did you use COMBINED female hormone PILLS which contained both ESTROGEN and TESTOSTERONE? Sub-question of F147 V1 Q12 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F147 V1 Q14 'Combined estr/testost pills'.

variable.name: ETTYPE_7
variable.comment:
In the past year, what type of COMBINED ESTROGEN and TESTOSTERONE pill did you use the longest? Sub-question of F147 V1 Q12 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F147 V1 Q14 'Combined estr/testost pills'.

variable.name: E_7
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use any ESTROGEN pill, patch, cream or shots (other than the combination described in Qxs 13 and 14)? Sub-question of F147 V1 Q12 'Used female hormones/past year'.

variable.name: EPL_7
variable.description: Did you use any Estrogen pill
variable.comment:
Did you use an estrogen pill? Sub-question of F147 V1 Q12 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F147 V1 Q15 'Estrogen pill,patch,cream,shot'.

variable.name: EPLDUR_7
variable.comment:
For how many months did you use the Estrogen pills? Sub-question of F147 V1 Q12 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F147 V1 Q15 'Estrogen pill,patch,cream,shot'.
Sub-question of F147 V1 Q15.1 'Did you use any Estrogen pill'.

variable.name: EPLTYPE_7
variable.comment:
What kind did you take? (Mark the one used the longest if you used more than one kind.) Sub-question of F147 V1 Q12 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F147 V1 Q15 'Estrogen pill,patch,cream,shot'.
Sub-question of F147 V1 Q15.1 'Did you use any Estrogen pill'.

variable.name: EPCH_7
variable.description: Did you use an estrogen patch?
variable.comment:
Did you use an estrogen patch? Sub-question of F147 V1 Q12 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F147 V1 Q15 'Estrogen pill,patch,cream,shot'.
On forms 143-145 this variable reflects estrogen use with or without progesterone.

variable.name: EPCHDUR_7
variable.comment:
For how many months did you use the patch? Sub-question of F147 V1 Q12 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F147 V1 Q15 'Estrogen pill,patch,cream,shot'.
Sub-question of F147 V1 Q15.4 'Did you use an estrogen patch?'.

variable.name: ECRM_7
variable.description: Did you use an estrogen cream?
variable.comment:
Did you use an estrogen cream? Sub-question of F147 V1 Q12 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F147 V1 Q15 'Estrogen pill,patch,cream,shot'.

variable.name: ECRMDUR_7
variable.comment:
For how many months did you use the cream? Sub-question of F147 V1 Q12 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F147 V1 Q15 'Estrogen pill,patch,cream,shot'.
Sub-question of F147 V1 Q15.6 'Did you use an estrogen cream?'.

variable.name: ESHT_7
variable.comment:
Did you have estrogen shots? Sub-question of F147 V1 Q12 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F147 V1 Q15 'Estrogen pill,patch,cream,shot'.

variable.name: ESHTDUR_7
variable.comment:
For how many months did you have the shots? Sub-question of F147 V1 Q12 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F147 V1 Q15 'Estrogen pill,patch,cream,shot'.
Sub-question of F147 V1 Q15.8 'Estrogen shots'.

variable.name: P_7
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use any PROGESTERONE or PROGESTIN pill, cream, or shots (other than the combinations described in Quextion 13)? Sub-question of F147 V1 Q12 'Used female hormones/past year'.

variable.name: PPL_7
variable.comment:
Did you use a progesterone or progestin pill or capsule? Sub-question of F147 V1 Q12 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F147 V1 Q16 'Progesterone pill, cream shot'.

variable.name: PPLDUR_7
variable.comment:
For how many months did you use the pill or capsule? Sub-question of F147 V1 Q12 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F147 V1 Q16 'Progesterone pill, cream shot'.
Sub-question of F147 V1 Q16.1 'Progesterone pill or capsule'.

variable.name: PPLTYPE_7
variable.comment:
What kind did you take (Mark the one used the longest if you used more than one kind)? Sub-question of F147 V1 Q12 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F147 V1 Q16 'Progesterone pill, cream shot'.
Sub-question of F147 V1 Q16.1 'Progesterone pill or capsule'.

variable.name: PPLDAY_7
variable.comment:
How many days per month did you use it? Sub-question of F147 V1 Q12 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F147 V1 Q16 'Progesterone pill, cream shot'.
Sub-question of F147 V1 Q16.1 'Progesterone pill or capsule'.

variable.name: PCRM_7
variable.comment:
Did you use a progesterone or progestin cream? Sub-question of F147 V1 Q12 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F147 V1 Q16 'Progesterone pill, cream shot'.

variable.name: PCRMDUR_7
variable.comment:
For how many months did you use progesterone or progestin cream? Sub-question of F147 V1 Q12 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F147 V1 Q16 'Progesterone pill, cream shot'.
Sub-question of F147 V1 Q16.5 'Progesterone/Progestin cream'.

variable.name: PSHT_7
variable.comment:
Did you have progesterone or progestin shots? Sub-question of F147 V1 Q12 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F147 V1 Q16 'Progesterone pill, cream shot'.

variable.name: PSHTDUR_7
variable.comment:
For how many months did you have progesterone or progestin shots Sub-question of F147 V1 Q12 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F147 V1 Q16 'Progesterone pill, cream shot'.
Sub-question of F147 V1 Q16.7 'Have progesterone shots'.

variable.name: CATARACT_7
variable.comment: Cataracts(s)

variable.name: MACDEGNR_7
variable.comment: Macular degeneration of the retina

variable.name: ASTHMA_7
variable.comment: Asthma

variable.name: EMPHYSEM_7
variable.comment: Emphysema or chronic bronchitis

variable.name: CHF_7
variable.comment: Heart failure or congestive heart failure

variable.name: ANGINA_7
variable.comment: Angina (chest pains from the heart)

variable.name: ATRIALFB_7
variable.comment: Atrial fibrillation

variable.name: KIDNEYST_7
variable.comment: Kidney or bladder stones (renal or urinary calculi)

variable.name: KIDDIALY_7
variable.comment: Dialysis for kidney or renal failure

variable.name: STOMULCR_7
variable.comment: Stomach or duodenal ulcer

variable.name: DIVERTIC_7
variable.comment: Diverticulitis

variable.name: PANCREAT_7
variable.comment: Pancreatitis (inflamed pancreas)

variable.name: LIVRDIS_7
variable.comment: Liver disease (chronic active hepatitis, cirrhosis, or yellow jaundice)

variable.name: OVRTHY_7
variable.comment: Overactive thyroid

variable.name: UNDTHY_7
variable.comment: Underactive thyroid

variable.name: ALZHEIM_7
variable.comment: Alzheimer's disease

variable.name: MS_7
variable.comment: Multiple sclerosis

variable.name: PARKINS_7
variable.comment: Parkinson's disease

variable.name: ALS_7
variable.comment: Amyotropic Lateral Sclerosis (ALS, motor neuron disease, or Lou Gehrig's disease)

variable.name: BRCA_7
variable.comment: Have you ever been diagnosed with breast cancer?

variable.name: BRCAAGE_7
variable.description: Age decade at breast cancer diagnosis
variable.comment: At what age were you diagnosed? Sub-question of F147 V1 Q18 'Ever diagnosed w/breast cancer'.

variable.name: SPOUSDIE_7
variable.comment: Did your spouse or partner die?

variable.name: SPOUSILL_7
variable.comment: Did your spouse or partner have a serious illness?

variable.name: FRIENDIE_7
variable.comment: Did a close friend or family member die or have a serious illness (other than your spouse or partner)?

variable.name: MONPROB_7
variable.comment: Did you have any major problems with money?

variable.name: DIVORCE_7
variable.comment: Did you have a divorce or break-up with a spouse or partner?

variable.name: FRNDIV_7
variable.comment: Did a family member or close friend have a divorce or break-up?

variable.name: CHILCON_7
variable.comment: Did you have a major conflict with children or grandchildren?

variable.name: MAJACC_7
variable.comment: Do you have any major accident, disasters, muggings, unwanted sexual experiences, robberies, or similar events?

variable.name: FRNJOB_7
variable.comment: Did you or a family member or close friend lose their job or retire?

variable.name: PETDIE_7
variable.comment: Did a pet die?

variable.name: HLPSICK_7
variable.comment: Are you now helping at least one sick, limited, or frail family member or friend on a regular basis?

variable.name: HLPSICKT_7
variable.comment: In the past 4 weeks, how often have you helped this friend or family member? Sub-question of F147 V1 Q20 'Helping sick/frail family'.

variable.name: MOMUSBRN_7
variable.comment: Was your mother born in the United States or outside of the United States?

variable.name: MOMUSREG_7
variable.comment: What region? Sub-question of F147 V1 Q21 'Mother born in US' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: MOMWORLD_7
variable.comment: Which area? Sub-question of F147 V1 Q21.1 'US birth region' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: BIRTHMOM_7
variable.comment: Was this your biological (birth) mother?

variable.name: DADUSBRN_7
variable.comment: Was your father born in the United States or outside of the United States?

variable.name: DADUSREG_7
variable.comment: Which region? Sub-question of F147 V1 Q22 'Father born in US' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: DADWORLD_7
variable.comment: Which area? Sub-question of F147 V1 Q22.1 'US birth region' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: BIRTHDAD_7
variable.comment: Was this your biological (birth) father?

variable.name: MARITAL_7
variable.comment: What is your current marital status? (Mark the one that best describes you.)
variable.value: Living in a marriage like relationship

variable.name: TEPIWK_7
variable.description: Episodes recreational phys activity per week
variable.comment: Computed from Form 147, questions 4, 5, 6, and 7. Total number of episodes per week of recreational physical activity (includes walking, mild, moderate and strenuous physical activity).

variable.name: LEPITOT_7
variable.description: Episodes recreational phys activity per week >= 20 Min
variable.comment: Computed from Form 147, questions 4, 4.1, 5, 5.1, 6, 6.1, 7, and 7.1. Episodes per week of recreational physical activity of >=20 minutes duration (includes walking, mild, moderate and strenuous physical activity).

variable.name: MSEPIWK_7
variable.description: Episodes moderate to strenuous phys activity per week
variable.comment: Computed from Form 147, questions 4.2, 5, and 6. Episodes per week of moderate and strenuous recreational physical activity (includes walking fairly fast or very fast, moderate physical activity and strenuous physical activity).

variable.name: XLMSEPI_7
variable.description: Episodes moderate to strenuous activity >= 20 min/week
variable.comment: Computed from Form 147, questions 4, 4.1, 4.2, 5, 5.1, 6, and 6.1. Episodes per week of moderate and strenuous recreational physical activity of >=20 minutes duration (includes walking fairly fast or very fast, moderate physical activity and strenuous physical activity).

variable.name: LMSEPI_7
variable.description: Episodes moderate to strenuous activity >=20 min/week (categ)
variable.comment: Computed from Form 147, questions 4, 4.1, 4.2, 5, 5.1, 6, and 6.1. Categorical variable of episodes per week of moderate and strenuous recreational physical activity of >= 20 minutes duration (includes walking fairly fast or very fast, moderate physical activity and strenuous physical activity). Computed from XLMSEPI and TEPIWK.

variable.name: SEPIWK_7
variable.comment: Computed from Form 147, question 5. Episodes per week of strenuous recreational physical activity.

variable.name: TMINWK_7
variable.description: Minutes of recreational phys activity per week
variable.comment: Computed from Form 147, questions 4, 4.1, 5, 5.1, 6, 6.1, 7, and 7.1. Total minutes per week of recreational physical activity (includes walking, mild, moderate and strenuous physical activity).

variable.name: MSMINWK_7
variable.description: Minutes of moderate to strenuous activity per week
variable.comment: Computed from Form 147, questions 4, 4.1, 4.2, 5, and 6. Minutes per week of moderate and strenuous recreational physical activity (includes walking fairly fast or very fast, moderate physical activity and strenuous physical activity).

variable.name: SMINWK_7
variable.description: Minutes of strenuous phys activity per week
variable.comment: Computed from Form 147, questions 5 and 5.1. Minutes per week of strenuous recreational physical activity.

variable.name: TEXPWK_7
variable.description: Total energy expend from recreational phys. activity (MET-hours/week)
variable.comment: Computed from Form 147, questions 4, 4.1, 4.2, 5, 5.1, 6, 6.1, 7, and 7.1. Total MET-hours per week. Expenditure of energy from recreational physical activity (includes walking, mild, moderate and strenuous physical activity in kcal/week/kg).

variable.name: WALKEXP_7
variable.comment: Computed from Form 147, questions 4, 4.1, and 4.2. Expenditure of energy from physical activity from walking in kcal/week/kg (MET-hours per week).

variable.name: AVWKEXP_7
variable.comment: Computed from Form 147, questions 4, 4.1 and 4.2. Energy expenditure from average walking (2-3 mph) in MET-hours per week. If question 6.2 (speed of walking) was marked as 'don't know' or was missing, the speed was assumed to be 2-3 mph.

variable.name: FFWKEXP_7
variable.description: Energy expend from walking fairly fast (MET-hours/week)
variable.comment: Computed from Form 147, questions 4, 4.1 and 4.2. Energy expenditure form walking fairly fast (3-4 mph) in MET-hours per week.

variable.name: VFWKEXP_7
variable.description: Energy expend from walking very fast (MET-hours/week)
variable.comment: Computed from Form 147, questions 4, 4.1, and 4.2. Energy expenditure from walking very fast (> 4 mph) in MET-hours per week.

variable.name: HARDEXP_7
variable.comment: Computed from Form 147, questions 5 and 5.1. Energy expenditure from strenuous or very hard exercise (for example, aerobics, aerobic dancing, jogging, tennis, swimming laps) in MET-hours per week.

variable.name: MODEXP_7
variable.comment: Computed from Form 147, questions 6 and 6.1. Energy expenditure from moderate exercise (for example, biking outdoors, using an exercise machine, calisthenics, easy swimming, popular or folk dancing) in MET-hours per week.

variable.name: MILDEXP_7
variable.comment: Computed from Form 147, questions 7 and 7.1. Energy expenditure from mild exercise (for example, slow dancing, bowling, golf) in MET-hours per week.

variable.name: HRT_7
variable.description: Hormone use last year (estrogen or progesterone)
